name: Queer Quest Demo
description:
This is a free demo for a currently in-progress game!

Queer Quest is a point-and-clit adventure game.

How To Play:  

  • Right click to look. Left click to interact.  
  • Access inventory by clicking the fanny pack in the top left corner.
  • Combine items by clicking on one, then clicking on the other (either in inventory or in the scene).
  • Space or click to continue dialog

Find a bug? Please let us know!  The windows version is wildly untested.
